options: ['an American girl', 'an English girl', 'a Chinese girl', 'a Chinese boy']
article: I am Wei Fang. I am a Chinese girl. I have  a good friend. Her name is Miaomiao. Do you think  Miaomiao is a nice girl ? That's wrong . She isn't a girl but a cat. She's a little   lovely  cat. Miaomiao is black and brown. She is only fourteen days old. She _ e  her mother Mimi.
